attributes.additional_details:
Fireworks is animal abuse 
Lots of animals are killed on roads lots of animals die of shock or heart attacks 
Ban fireworks
attributes.background: All the animals suffer every year not just one night anymore its weeks of suffering this is animal abuse on so many levels they should not be sold to public anymore only council events once a year

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Ban fireworks
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700199
